titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on [3,3'-Bianthra[1,9-cd]ptrazole]-6,6'(1H,1'H)-dione,1,1'-diet yl-.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 7/11/2001--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2004, the duty on a specified chemical.
